entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
